Thu Dec 28 03:13:44 PM UTC 2023
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/bin
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/rsync-3.2.7/bin/rsync /opt/bin/rsync
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/rsync-3.2.7/bin/rsync-ssl /opt/bin/rsync-ssl
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share/man
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share/man/man5
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share/man/man1
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/rsync-3.2.7/share/man/man5/rsyncd.conf.5 /opt/share/man/man5/rsyncd.conf.5
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/rsync-3.2.7/share/man/man1/rsync-ssl.1 /opt/share/man/man1/rsync-ssl.1
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/rsync-3.2.7/share/man/man1/rsync.1 /opt/share/man/man1/rsync.1
